description: [NOTE: this stopped working sometime in late 2019. I barely use Twitter anymore so I haven't updated it.] Removes all messaging/notification elements & counts from the UI, and also removes "engagement" buttons underneath tweets (Reply, RT, DM, Fav, Analytics). Basically it turns twitter.com into a naked timeline plus a "tweet" button.
additional_info:
This theme is a modification/combination of "Write-Only Twitter" [https://userstyles.org/styles/106431/write-only-twitter] and "Hide Counts" [https://userstyles.org/styles/118282/twitter-hide-counts].
 
Edit the CSS to kill or restore specific UI elements (e.g. DMs, Notifications, profile stats, etc.). Comments are in there to orient you to the best of my knowledge.
